abstract: The reversal was prompted by what the retailer said was “manufactured controversy” surrounding the proposal.
snippet: The reversal was prompted by what the retailer said was “manufactured controversy” surrounding the proposal.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart said today that it has abandoned plans to open its own bank, a reversal prompted by what the retailer said was “manufactured controversy” surrounding the proposal.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Drops Bid to Operate Its Own Bank
